fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Fixate on a complex point at night, by choosing a player, a night, and a target, at the cost of 6 points.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If the player visits (or attempts to visit) the target on that night, you will enter Polar Form the following night.
In Polar Form, visit a player, making them and whoever they visit “Solved 1 by 3” while also muting your target the next day.
